title: CraftNight: Paper Wreaths with Mark Montano
desc: (Galleries open 6:30-9:30pm) *Project Demonstrations at 7:00pm & 7:30pm $8/ Free for Members (includes materials, drinks, and snacks) In the courtyard Make your own paper holiday wreath! Designer and television personality Mark Montano will host a night of paper, pattern and holiday color for this special December CraftNight!
